{{Other ships|HMS Raider}} {|{{Infobox ship begin}} {{Infobox ship image |Ship image=[[Image:P2000 Class Royal Navy Patrol Vessel HMS Raider MOD 45151351.jpg|300px]] |Ship caption=HMS ''Raider'' in 2009 }} {{Infobox ship career |Hide header= |Ship country=[[United Kingdom]] |Ship flag={{shipboxflag|UK|naval}} |Ship name=HMS ''Raider'' |Ship operator=[[Royal Navy]] |Ship ordered= |Ship awarded= |Ship builder=[[Ailsa Shipbuilding Company]] |Ship yard number= |Ship laid down= |Ship launched= |Ship sponsor= |Ship christened= |Ship completed= |Ship acquired= |Ship commissioned=January 1998 |Ship recommissioned= |Ship decommissioned= |Ship in service= |Ship out of service= |Ship renamed= |Ship reclassified= |Ship refit= |Ship struck= |Ship reinstated= |Ship homeport=HMNB Clyde |Ship identification=[[Pennant number]]: P275 |Ship motto= |Ship nickname= |Ship honours= |Ship captured= |Ship status={{Ship in active service}} |Ship notes= |Ship badge= }} {{Infobox ship characteristics |Hide header= |Header caption= |Ship class={{sclass|Archer|patrol vessel}} |Ship tonnage= |Ship displacement=54 tonnes<ref>[http://www.royalnavy.mod.uk/the-equipment/ships/patrol-and-mine-hunters/patrol-boats Royal Navy - Patrol Boats - Archer class], royalnavy.mod.uk, Retrieved 14 June 2014</ref> |Ship tons burthen= |Ship length=20.8 m |Ship beam=5.8 m |Ship height= |Ship draught=1.8 m |Ship draft= |Ship depth= |Ship hold depth= |Ship decks= |Ship deck clearance= |Ship ramps= |Ship ice class= |Ship power= |Ship propulsion= *2 shafts, [[Rolls-Royce plc|Rolls Royce]] MTU V12 [[diesel engine]]s |Ship sail plan= |Ship speed= *{{convert|25|kn|km/h|abbr=on|lk=in}} *{{convert|45|kn|km/h|abbr=on|lk=in}} (Hull design, but limited due to engine fitted) |Ship range= *{{convert|550|nmi|km|-1|abbr=on}} |Ship endurance= |Ship test depth= |Ship boats= |Ship capacity= |Ship troops= |Ship complement= *12 |Ship crew= |Ship time to activate= |Ship sensors= *[[Decca Radar|Decca]] 1216 navigation radar |Ship EW= |Ship armament= *1 × [[Oerlikon 20 mm cannon]] on [[forecastle|fo'c'sle]] ("[[for but not with]]") *3 × [[FN MAG|General purpose machine guns]] |Ship armour=Ballistic protection fitted |Ship armor= |Ship aircraft= |Ship aircraft facilities= |Ship notes= }} |} '''HMS ''Raider''''' is an [[Archer class patrol vessel|''Archer''-class]] [[patrol boat|patrol and training vessel]] of the [[United Kingdom|British]] [[Royal Navy]]. Along with her batch 2 sister-ship, [[HMS Tracker (P274)|HMS ''Tracker'']], ''Raider'' is part of the Faslane Patrol Boat Squadron based at [[HMNB Clyde]].
==Characteristics== ''Raider'' is one of sixteen 20-metre, 54-tonne P2000 patrol craft operated by the Royal Navy. She is constructed from glass-reinforced plastic. As a "batch 2" vessel, ''Raider'' has a sustainable top speed of 24 knots, faster than her batch 1 sister ships due to her more powerful turbocharged MTU diesels; she can exceed 24 knots in suitable sea conditions. Both ''Raider'' and {{HMS|Tracker|P274|2}} operate in the force protection role, providing maritime security for high value shipping in the Firth of Clyde, and are armed with three [[FN MAG|general purpose machine guns]].
==Service== ''Raider'', formerly of Cambridge URNU, became Bristol URNU's training ship in Summer 2010, superseding [[HMS Trumpeter (P294)|HMS ''Trumpeter'']]. In October 2012 she joined the Faslane Patrol Boat Squadron to replace [[HMS Dasher (P280)|HMS ''Dasher'']], which returned to Bristol URNU.
